Articles.Content: Sorry I'm back to help with this. I have been a little busy and such...

Mike, would it be a good idea to provide a link to Jeast's arm?

yeah its on page one. click on the picture of the canadarm with jeasts name on it.

also will be part of download as soon as I upload update

- - - Updated - - -

Sorry I'm back to help with this. I have been a little busy and such...

hello, hope all is well

Ok! I actually need to get RSS together for the main shuttle series, but your shuttle will be in a sub-series I am working on for building a community space station!http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/136175-Station-Builder-%28Youtube-Video-Series%29
Does anyone know how to dock this thing with mechjeb and how to use mechjeb to get the space shuttle within 100m of an object
I'm having trouble re-entering. Every time I try I blow up. Is there a safe/right way to do it?

Does anyone know how to dock this thing with mechjeb and how to use mechjeb to get the space shuttle within 100m of an object

When I was doing some testing, I discovered that orienting the shuttle for a burn, you do not need to use your RCS thrusters. Turn them off and allow the internally provided servos to do the work

I'm having trouble re-entering. Every time I try I blow up. Is there a safe/right way to do it?

KSP Version:....................................

SSP Mod Version:...............................

FAR/Realism Overhaul (yes/no)..........................................

issue:...explode on re-entry.......

Extended Description(describe as best you can how/why this happened):...................................

- - - Updated - - -

I'm having trouble re-entering. Every time I try I blow up. Is there a safe/right way to do it?
When I was doing some testing, I discovered that orienting the shuttle for a burn, you do not need to use your RCS thrusters. Turn them off and allow the internally provided servos to do the work

Do the rcs thrusters make it harder?

Also I dont know much about mechjeb. Maybe someone can suggest some tips?

Exactly! That's what I mean:)) Well, I will waiting your fix and information.

Maybe it's happening because the ship gets less weight ? Fuel is burning and mass of the ship less?

When you start takeoff and climb the shuttle is stable. But if you start gravity turn or turn to orbit for meeting for another ship- shuttle begins moving left and right, up and down. You must hard using your keyboard for get him back to stable againe:( as result - many fuel is burn, and different orbit with another ship is 18-20 degrees:(

And Mike, where I can get new version with SRB fix?

http://s017.radikal.ru/i423/1510/af/faf57f101cc0.jpg

I was build this ISS using Shuttle Discovery and Canadaarm ) Thank you Mike and Jeast I will continie bulding ISS

Very cool! Would be great if you could make a video out of this!

Do the rcs thrusters make it harder?

Also I dont know much about mechjeb. Maybe someone can suggest some tips?

I just discovered in testing that, at least when using mechjeb, the thrusters tended to go haywire and burn too much fuel trying to catch up to the manuever node. Likewise, the internal gyros seem to do fine for shuttle orientation. I'll try to make a video showing my findings here pretty quick to show you what I mean...if you want?

Why I can`t mount Z1 module to Unity-1? I was try many...many times. ((every time I was place exactly module. But there was no docking.

It is possible? Or not?

Look at 1.13 on video...

Edited October 11, 2015 by Irenicus
I don't know anything about why it does not dock, but aint it easier when you dock your shuttle to the Unity and then use the arm to place the Z1 to the side?
could someone make a docking guide for the shuttle using mechjeb?

could someone make a docking guide for the shuttle using mechjeb?

Ok, when i get the oportunity, i'll film a,guide to how i perform rendezvous and docking.

Ok, when i get the opportunity, i'll film a,guide to how i perform rendezvous and docking.

Thank you some much, I really do appreciate it!
Hmmm. May be, but I think, the shuttle airlock ( airlock dock port) cannot dock to ISS dock port. Some different dock port. I am not try this. But I think it is true. Or not?

Hmmm. May be, but I think, the shuttle airlock ( airlock dock port) cannot dock to ISS dock port. Some different dock port. I am not try this. But I think it is true. Or not?

Well, I did notice that you did not attach the PMA to the shuttle side of the Unity
It will be great, if shuttle airlock will can dock to any dock port.

It is possible!!!!!!! Module Z1 is mounted!

Mission is over! Undock...

It is new station...

So.... What was the problem. It is module Z1. If you looking on this part (in KSC), you will see - the module already HAVE the dock port. BUT! This dock port NOT WORKING!!! I don`t know why... After you attach another dock port on module Z1 and... You sucessful dock Z1 module to ISS!!!

And... The shuttle airlock (dockport) sucssefuly dock to ISS dockport. It is working. All ok

PS. May be it the future I will re-dock module Z1: in this time I was attach him some little wrong (look the screens).

Edited October 12, 2015 by Irenicus

Lol, easy fix, just undock unity and. Reorient it. I noticed it too was orientated incorrectly...look at the pmas. The module b itself should look slightly lower compared to zarya.
